reviewText: I was left feeling hopeful and excited after watching Mr. Marx share his experiences and story.
I highly recommend this! Mark Marx is a great speaker and has a heart for reaching out to the greater community with the love of Jesus!

Mark Marx (and all contributors to Kingdom Insights) hits the 'happy medium' between the Gospel Word and practical, day-to-day life experiences.  This insight by Mr. Marx sparked a refreshing take on my day.  Very helpful -- from the heart.  More please!  R. Eckley (Brownsburg, IN)
Awesome testimony of his journey diving into the supernatural power of God.
Kingdom Insights have changed my life! Grow deeper in your walk with God through these life changing teachings. Sound, Biblical teachings!
